data.title: Apple’s New Challenge: A Wave of Key Executives Leaving the Company
data.meta_description: Apple is facing an unprecedented wave of executive departures. Also: The company will shake up its sales operations with a focus on India, a yellow iPhone arrives, and Amazon’s Ring and Sonos introduce key new products.
data.text:
Apple is facing an unprecedented wave of executive departures. Also: The company will shake up its sales operations with a focus on India, a yellow iPhone arrives, and Amazon’s Ring and Sonos introduce key new products.

Last week in Power On: Apple readies its next range of Mac computers, including — finally — a new iMac.
